document.full_text: the death toll this week from tornadoes and severe storms pummeling the south rose to 25 people and the nasty weather is not yet over, emergency officials and weather forecasters said on wednesday.
document.title: death toll at 25 in latest bout of storms
lines_and_colors: the death toll this week from tornadoes and severe storms pummeling the south rose to 25 people and the nasty weather is not yet over, emergency officials and weather forecasters said on wednesday.
